about.sub_header: Ampolic Digital Solutions LLC is a Toledo based digital marketing agency that specializes in helping small businesses grow their online presence. We design all of our websites from scratch to ensure everything we produce is optimized to help you get found organically and give your customers the best experience possible.

key_points.title: Web Design
key_points.description: The first step in creating a great website is having a great design! At Ampolic, we hand craft all of our designs to ensure they look, feel, and function exactly how you want.

key_points.title: SEO
key_points.description: Our in depth search engine optimization and analytics software ensures that your site ranks high in search engines like Google, Bing!, and Duckduckgo so that you will receive the maximum organic traffic.

key_points.title: Mobile Responsive
key_points.description: All pages are tested against many different devices so that it is fully functional and responsive on mobile phones, tablets, laptops, and desktop computers.
